CommandDefinition.Name: deploy
CommandDefinition.Description: Deploy a saved workflow with an optional workflow protection mode.

Argument.Name: fqWorkflowName
Argument.Description: The fully qualified path to the workflow to be deployed.

Argument.Name: protectionMode
Argument.Description: DEFAULT: Abort deployment if an object in the dependency tree is in use. TRY: Abort deployment if there are incompatible interfacechanges or if an order using an object in the dependency tree is not suspendable within timeout configured in the Xyna property 'xyna.ordersuspension.workflowstep.timeout'. FORCE: Equivalent to 'TRY' but ignores interface changes. FORCEKILL: Equivalent to 'FORCE' but also sends an interrupt signal to the threads of running orders.

Argument.Name: applicationName
Argument.Description: The name of the application in which the workflow should be replaced.

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: The version name of the application in which the workflow should be replaced.

Argument.Name: xmlFile
Argument.Description: The name of the xml file that should replace the existing workflow definition.

Argument.Name: workspaceName
Argument.Description: The name of the workspace containing the ordertype.
